question:
You want to learn a language. There is a teacher near to where you live.

Write a letter to the teacher. In the letter:

say how you came to know about him/her
explain why you want to learn
ask what help they can offer.
text: I, Kuljeet Kaur, residing near your locality, writing to you to express my desire to study language with you. I got very excited when I came to know that a well-qualified teacher is shifted  to our colony as I want to learn English for a very long time ago.

Firstly, I heard about you from one of my friends who is your neighbour and lived there for about a period of four years.Secondly, he also takes classes from you and elaborates on the way you adopt to teach your children which impressed me a lot.

Adding on, I want to grasp this language in order to have a good command of it which further helps me to accomplish my goals in future. As I want to pursue my education in another nation where it is of great use. Therefore, for the betterment of my interest, I would like to take classes from you.

Also, I want to join the group in an evening batch as in the morning time I am a little bit busy. Furthermore, I also want to know about the fees for the whole course.So, I want you to please forward the details so that I can manage my schedule as well as my funds.
Hoping to get a reply from your side.
